items.title: Federal officials say Georgia Republican was running a $140 million Ponzi scheme
items.description: Federal officials are accusing Georgia Republican Brant Frost IV of running a Ponzi scheme that defrauded 300 investors of $140 million

items.title: Son of ‘El Chapo’ expected to plead guilty in drug trafficking case
items.description: A son of drug lord Joaquin “El Chapo” Guzman is expected to plead guilty in a U.S. drug trafficking case

items.title: Wildfires force evacuations at Grand Canyon's North Rim and Colorado national park
items.description: Visitors and staff at two national parks in the U.S. West have been evacuted because of wildfires

items.title: Costa Rican lawmaker says U.S. revoked her visa over alleged ties to Communist Party
items.description: The vice president of Costa Rica’s Congress says the U.S. embassy revoked her visa over alleged ties to the Chinese Communist Party

items.title: North Carolina's first standalone children's hospital set to bring 8,000 jobs to a Raleigh suburb
items.description: North Carolina's first standalone children’s hospital will be built in a bedroom community of Raleigh
